price: و فرمانروایی‌اش را استوار نمودیم و پیامبری و کلامی فیصله‌بخش به او عطا کردیم.
arabic: وَشَدَدۡنَا مُلۡكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلۡحِكۡمَةَ وَفَصۡلَ ٱلۡخِطَابِ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: washadadnā mul'kahu waātaynāhu al-ḥik'mata wafaṣla al-khiṭābi
